Page.Name: TradeSkills
Page.OnShow:
Recipes.CreateButton.visible=true Recipes.CreateButton.IsDefaultButton=true
COND1=(Parent.DrumsUI_TSLayout.width == 1) COND2=(TabPages.Craft.Recipes.StaticRecipes.checked == true) COND=(COND1 && COND2) TabPages.Craft.Recipes.DoCommand.onpress=TabPages.Craft.Recipes.StaticRecipes.OnUnset TabPages.Craft.Recipes.DoCommand.visible=(COND ? true : false) TabPages.Craft.Recipes.StaticRecipes.checked=(COND1 ? false : true)

Button.Name: ExtendHide
Button.OnPress:
Parent.minimumsize=(376,382) Parent.width=(Parent.width - 376) Parent.LeftSide.width=(Parent.width - 5) Parent.RightSide.width=(Parent.width - 5) Parent.RightSide.left=3 Parent.RightSide.packsize=(a,a) Parent.RightSide.packlocation=(left,top)
Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.width=(Parent.width - 5) Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.left=3 Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.packsize=(a,a) Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.packlocation=(left,top) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.width=(Parent.width - 5) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.left=3 Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.packsize=(a,a) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.packlocation=(left,top)
Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.width=(Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.width + 1) Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.width=(Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.width - 1) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.width=(Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.width + 1) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.width=(Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.width - 1)

Button.Name: ExtendShow
Button.OnPress:
Parent.TabPages.Craft.Recipes.visible=true
Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.packsize=(f,a) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.packsize=(f,a)
Parent.RightSide.packsize=(f,a)
Parent.width=(Parent.width + 376) Parent.minimumsize=(752,382) Parent.LeftSide.width=(Parent.width - 376) Parent.RightSide.width=371 Parent.RightSide.left=(Parent.width - 376) Parent.RightSide.packlocation=(right,top)
Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.width=371 Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.left=(Parent.width - 376) Parent.TabPages.Craft.Create.packlocation=(right,top) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.width=371 Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.left=(Parent.width - 376) Parent.TabPages.Experiment.Create.packlocation=(right,top)

Checkbox.Name: StaticRecipes
Checkbox.OnPress: window_property unlock Custom DrumsUI_TSLayout Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TSLayout.Width=(COND ? 2 : 1) COND=(checked == true) window_property lock Custom DrumsUI_TSLayout
